attributes.action: Take Pakistan out of the red list countries
attributes.additional_details:
I am disgusted at how Pakistan is still
In the red list and India is being moved to Amber. 
This is very unfair and stupid! India has an average of 40,000 cases per week whereas Pakistan has an average of 2,300 cases per week!! 
Where is the sense in that!
attributes.background: Move Pakistan out of the red list countries, and put India back into red list countries

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the three petitions we currently have open on this topic:

Remove Pakistan from red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974

India to be added to red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582026

Remove Bangladesh and Pakistan from the Government red list
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582337
